title: URGENT!! NEED SUB TO FILL IN OUR FIRST GAME FOR OOL SECOND DAY AND POSSIBLY TO STAY ON TEAM!! Plat++
body: HI this is urgennnnttt!!! So if you are reading this, play jungle and are plat or higher we need you!!! Our team: Raid Boss Gatez has made it to the second and final day of the OOL competitive series unfortunately our jungler cant make the first game and we need someone like you! IF you do well in our game you will be guaranteed a spot on our team! Please dont hesitate to add Vincent Jr or myself DAWNBRINGER (yes the l is an L)... Anyway please hurry and jump on game starts at 11!!!!!
